channel.title: The Legend of Icaria
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement-Thread.png[/img] More Media to Follow After the Launch
Forums: [URL=http://"http://www.icariagaming.net/Forums/index.php"]YOU MUST REGISTER TO PLAY[/URL] | Download: [URL=http://"http://www.icariagaming.net/Icaria.jar"]Direct Link[/URL] : [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/k5lllrdkd7b39nq/Icaria.jar?dl=0"]Mirror 1[/URL] [/CENTER]
FEATURES:
[ul][*]Bank Tabs [*]100% Clan Chat w/o Lootshare [*]3 Unique Quests [*]Money Vault [*]Prestige System [*]AFK Emotes [*]Zombies Minigame [*]Boss Slayer [*]Decanting [*]Crystal Chest [*]Raids [*]User Profiles [*]Rep System [*]Unique Starter Interface [*]Over 10 Bosses [*]Multiple Training Locations [*]Very little known bugs with most features working [*]SQL Integration[/ul]
UPDATE LOG: [URL=http://"https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NNQWvWuW7lsXv6BbcyEWAsUaL6j2CenjMkyU_ypB6Tk/edit?usp=sharing"]https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NNQWvWuW7lsXv6BbcyEWAsUaL6j2CenjMkyU_ypB6Tk/edit?usp=sharing[/URL]or when updated here
Dag Rex and Prime are hittable. Iron ore can’t be smithed into steel bars without having coal Fixed zombie survival atk rates of all zombies. Added lower mystery box cost and add food and prayer restoration consumables. Fixed Zombie survival gear at level 5 (rune) weapon is noted. Fixed Omega eggs not leaving inventory after barb assault Fixed Fight Cave Mapdata Fixed Skills Necklace Slot Fixed Diamond Bolt Equipment Slot Fixed Firemaking while Woodcutting Fixed Woodcutting Spam Clicking Pest Control Map Godwars Maps Barbarian Assault teleport now teleports you to Cain at Lunar Isle GWD Altars now recovers Prayer Points Added Choose Class interface for when teleporting to Zombies Fixed Zombies not teleporting to location Fixed Bandos and Skillcapes in improper slots Fixed Teleporting to Zombie Survival while in ZS KBD is now visible Kalphite Queen Map data added The Harmless Island quest finished and map data added Barrelchest boss finished, fremmy helms are obtainable via boss. Chaos Elemental reverted to old form, is 100% with drops Metal Dragon animations fixed East Dragons PvP teleport fixed, Mapdata added Fixed brimhaven area near black demons missing mapdata and causes client to crash Added Range and Magic Classes Fixed Zombie Ingame interface updating based on Class Chosen Added Bank Tabs Added Achievement System with 3 Tiers of Difficulty Fixed zombies walking through walls to get to you Fixed Chaos Elemental crashing client Began creation of Boss Slayer addition Added Boss Kill Records Dag Rex and Prime are now hittable with mage and range Prophecy Tablet Read to Boost working (Needs Timer To Stop Spam) Doors in Edgeville (Home) now work, as well as the Range and Smelting area houses. Prestige Mentor is now accessible at home Fixed Slayer Tower Mapdata and Added Spawns Improved Door Handling, Fixed Door to access The Crystal Chest Removed the random numbers on the “Which bar would you like to make?” interface Added Achievement for Revenant Slaying Added Group Teleporting (Will use for Raid and Co-Op Zombies Base) Added Clickable Walkable Interfaces Fixed Aubury at home Added Fouth Click NPC Support Fixed Black Item Client Sided Fixed Aubury and Vannaka Improved Godwars Interface All Godwars kills are for appropriate god Strange floor agility shortcut in Tavernly dungeon fixed Fixed bug where you attack a player it spams your chat if you haven’t played for an hour Fixed Onyx Bolts (e) going into the wrong slot Fixed Abyssal Whip, It now binds and does GFX on opponent Fixed All Lunar Spellbook Teleports Lunar is now functional and stable for release Added 3 Choosable AFK actions Added Boss Slayer Support to NPC Improved Zombie Ingame Interface and Added Toggle Button Fixed Split Private Chat Toggling Added Proper +2 Prayer Bonus to ALL Skillcapes Added Dragon Claw Special Reorganized Skill Zone All Zombie Classes are functional and working, have fun in zombies guys! Fixed Zombies Classes Capping at 35 Fixed when starting a fire it says “You don’t have the required Items.” Fixed Relleke Dungeon Client Crash Fixed being in zombies at slayer tower. (You can now also tele from Slayer Tower) Fixed magic level of 20 requirement of Kills Left on Enchanted Gem Fixed Rock Tails, they are now 100% functional! Added Slayer Helmet Effect Added NPC Direction Facing Fletching now has option for both willow short and long bow (u) Granite Maul Special appears to be fixed and working on both NPC and Players Fixed PK Point Farming Fixed not being able to use iron arrows with a short bow Added Range Level of 50 Requirement to Magic Longbow Fixed Fighter Torso and Defenders equipping in wrong slot Fixed Fighter Torsos 60 Range Requirement and turned it to 40 Attack Fixed TzHaar Bank not being accessible Fixed Enchanted Gem equipping when clicking Kills Left Added Working Ignore List Added WindSpeed variation for future addtions Added full cactus support to obtain water in the desert Added NPC Chat heads to NPC Chatting Added Party Pete to home with Proper Dialogue and Clicking for Idle Dancing Fixed needing to relog for barrows resetting Different Barrows Brother upon Completion of a run
Media: a.k.a The Moment EVERYONE has been waiting for
By Mod Trilla: [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/6.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/7.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/8.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/9.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/10.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/11.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/12.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/13.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/14.png[/img]
By Raexon: [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/15.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/16.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/17.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/18.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/19.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/20.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.icariagaming.net/Advertisement/21.png[/img]

item.title: The Legend of Icaria
item.dc:creator: @wizofdeath8 wizofdeath8
item.description:
@wizofdeath8 wrote:

[CENTER]
More Media to Follow After the Launch

Forums: [URL=http://“http://www.icariagaming.net/Forums/index.php”]YOU MUST REGISTER TO PLAY[/URL] | Download: [URL=http://“http://www.icariagaming.net/Icaria.jar”]Direct Link[/URL] : [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/k5lllrdkd7b39nq/Icaria.jar?dl=0"]Mirror 1[/URL]
[/CENTER]

FEATURES:

[ul][]Bank Tabs
[]100% Clan Chat w/o Lootshare
[]3 Unique Quests
[]Money Vault
[]Prestige System
[]AFK Emotes
[]Zombies Minigame
[]Boss Slayer
[]Decanting
[]Crystal Chest
[]Raids
[]User Profiles
[]Rep System
[]Unique Starter Interface
[]Over 10 Bosses
[]Multiple Training Locations
[]Very little known bugs with most features working
[]SQL Integration[/ul]

UPDATE LOG:
[URL=http://“https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NNQWvWuW7lsXv6BbcyEWAsUaL6j2CenjMkyU_ypB6Tk/edit?usp=sharing”]https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NNQWvWuW7lsXv6BbcyEWAsUaL6j2CenjMkyU_ypB6Tk/edit?usp=sharing[/URL]or when updated here

Dag Rex and Prime are hittable.
Iron ore can’t be smithed into steel bars without having coal
Fixed zombie survival atk rates of all zombies.
Added lower mystery box cost and add food and prayer restoration consumables.
Fixed Zombie survival gear at level 5 (rune) weapon is noted.
Fixed Omega eggs not leaving inventory after barb assault
Fixed Fight Cave Mapdata
Fixed Skills Necklace Slot
Fixed Diamond Bolt Equipment Slot
Fixed Firemaking while Woodcutting
Fixed Woodcutting Spam Clicking
Pest Control Map
Godwars Maps
Barbarian Assault teleport now teleports you to Cain at Lunar Isle
GWD Altars now recovers Prayer Points
Added Choose Class interface for when teleporting to Zombies
Fixed Zombies not teleporting to location
Fixed Bandos and Skillcapes in improper slots
Fixed Teleporting to Zombie Survival while in ZS
KBD is now visible
Kalphite Queen Map data added
The Harmless Island quest finished and map data added
Barrelchest boss finished, fremmy helms are obtainable via boss.
Chaos Elemental reverted to old form, is 100% with drops
Metal Dragon animations fixed
East Dragons PvP teleport fixed, Mapdata added
Fixed brimhaven area near black demons missing mapdata and causes client to crash
Added Range and Magic Classes
Fixed Zombie Ingame interface updating based on Class Chosen
Added Bank Tabs
Added Achievement System with 3 Tiers of Difficulty
Fixed zombies walking through walls to get to you
Fixed Chaos Elemental crashing client
Began creation of Boss Slayer addition
Added Boss Kill Records
Dag Rex and Prime are now hittable with mage and range
Prophecy Tablet Read to Boost working (Needs Timer To Stop Spam)
Doors in Edgeville (Home) now work, as well as the Range and Smelting area houses.
Prestige Mentor is now accessible at home
Fixed Slayer Tower Mapdata and Added Spawns
Improved Door Handling, Fixed Door to access The Crystal Chest
Removed the random numbers on the “Which bar would you like to make?” interface
Added Achievement for Revenant Slaying
Added Group Teleporting (Will use for Raid and Co-Op Zombies Base)
Added Clickable Walkable Interfaces
Fixed Aubury at home
Added Fouth Click NPC Support
Fixed Black Item Client Sided
Fixed Aubury and Vannaka
Improved Godwars Interface
All Godwars kills are for appropriate god
Strange floor agility shortcut in Tavernly dungeon fixed
Fixed bug where you attack a player it spams your chat if you haven’t played for an hour
Fixed Onyx Bolts (e) going into the wrong slot
Fixed Abyssal Whip, It now binds and does GFX on opponent
Fixed All Lunar Spellbook Teleports
Lunar is now functional and stable for release
Added 3 Choosable AFK actions
Added Boss Slayer Support to NPC
Improved Zombie Ingame Interface and Added Toggle Button
Fixed Split Private Chat Toggling
Added Proper +2 Prayer Bonus to ALL Skillcapes
Added Dragon Claw Special
Reorganized Skill Zone
All Zombie Classes are functional and working, have fun in zombies guys!
Fixed Zombies Classes Capping at 35
Fixed when starting a fire it says “You don’t have the required Items.”
Fixed Relleke Dungeon Client Crash
Fixed being in zombies at slayer tower. (You can now also tele from Slayer Tower)
Fixed magic level of 20 requirement of Kills Left on Enchanted Gem
Fixed Rock Tails, they are now 100% functional!
Added Slayer Helmet Effect
Added NPC Direction Facing
Fletching now has option for both willow short and long bow (u)
Granite Maul Special appears to be fixed and working on both NPC and Players
Fixed PK Point Farming
Fixed not being able to use iron arrows with a short bow
Added Range Level of 50 Requirement to Magic Longbow
Fixed Fighter Torso and Defenders equipping in wrong slot
Fixed Fighter Torsos 60 Range Requirement and turned it to 40 Attack
Fixed TzHaar Bank not being accessible
Fixed Enchanted Gem equipping when clicking Kills Left
Added Working Ignore List
Added WindSpeed variation for future addtions
Added full cactus support to obtain water in the desert
Added NPC Chat heads to NPC Chatting
Added Party Pete to home with Proper Dialogue and Clicking for Idle Dancing
Fixed needing to relog for barrows resetting
Different Barrows Brother upon Completion of a run

Media: a.k.a The Moment EVERYONE has been waiting for

By Mod Trilla:













By Raexon:






Read full topic
